modName: Dovah Weapons Pack - Dragon bone handles
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------
Version 2.0
Uploaded 11/9/2012
Special thanks to David Brasher for talking me through merging the plugin files into one plugin.
---------------------------

Named for the dragon bones that go into their creation, Dovah means dragon in the dragon\'s language, these weapons are made to look more polished and well maintained.

This pack adds seven new craftable Damascus steel and dragonbone weapons with raindrop pattern Damascus Steel blades, brass fittings and dragon bone grips.   They are found under the Dwarven smithing perk, they can be upgraded and enchanted and are typically slightly more deadly than Dwarven weapons but not so mush as to be overpowering in game. These weapons do not replace any of Skyrim\'s existing weapons. 

Included weapons:
Dagger
Sword
Greatsword
Battle Axe
War Axe
Mace
War Hammer

Video review by Brodual
[youtube]JslEopik4jA[/youtube]

********************************************************************

Installation:

Download and install using the Mod Manager.

To manually install:
Extract the zip file, place the .esp files, the Meshes and Textures folders into your Skyrim Data Folder, if promted merge, nothing will be over written unless you\'re updating from a previous version.



Upgrading to a newer version:
Uninstall the previous version with the Nexus Mod Manager.
Download and install the newer version.
Play Skyrim and kill stuff.


Manually updating:
Extract the zip file, place the .esp files, the Meshes and Textures folders into your Skyrim Data Folder, if promted merge, and over write the files and folders of the previous version.

If you previously had the 1.0 or 1.0a version installed you may lose the items you created at the forge, to replace them:

1. Press the ~ key to open the consol commands, type in Help Dovah.   You should see a list of the Dovah weapons and their PRID numbers.
2. Select the item you want to add and type    player.additem <ITEM NUMBER HERE> <NUMBER WANTED HERE>

For example to get one battle axe you would type in:

player.additem 2c00182a 1


3. Press Enter on your keyboard and you should get a confirmation message that the item was added.

4. Repeat for each of the Dovah weapons you want to add to your inventory, replacing the item number to match each weapons specific ID number.

********************************************************************

Meshes and textures created by me in 3DS Max and Photoshop.
If you wish to modify my weapons or use them in some way please contact me first.


Thanks to...
Ghosu - for his weapons tutorials, thank you for helping others learn.

Youtube user officerbeardontcare for his NifSkope tutorial videos.

Bethesda - Skyrim and it\'s assets
author: Jennifur68
